description:
Pick up a Killswitch case for your ROG Ally or Steam Deck from dbrand at https://dbrand.com/killswitch

ASUS really sucks as a company right now, but the improvements to the ROG Ally handheld are undeniable. While we like the Ally X, we can't recommend it until we see a massive overhaul in terms of customer and RMA support. 

Hackaday Article: https://hackaday.com/2024/05/04/rog-ally-sd-card-slot-fix-shines-light-on-ptc-fuse-failure-modes/

ASUS "Enhancing Communication Processes in Canada and USA"
Press Release 1: https://www.asus.com/us/news/nythl3v1fqlpe8jy/
Press Release 2: https://www.asus.com/us/news/m50snujj9jfgq5zq/
Their Action Plan: https://www.asus.com/us/site/assets/ASUS-Service-Updates.pdf
ROG Ally Warranty Extension: https://x.com/ASUS_ROGNA/status/1797131331446669510

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1572300-i-cant-recommend-the-rog-ally-x/

Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.

► GET MERCH: htt
title: I Can't Recommend the ROG Ally X
